title: 同张地图地图多次(7次)搬运
author: Koke_Cacao
txt_content:
按照时间顺序: 旧 -> 新
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-185881-1-1.html
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-198934-1-1.html
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-188733-1-1.html
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-189790-1-1.html
还有一个搬运的错版: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-365600-1-1.html
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-375275-1-1.html
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-501099-1-1.html

我就不明白, 一张地图搬运了7次还有人搬运

replies.author: connection_lost
replies.txt_content:
建议禁止非源地址搬运
例如禁止所有1/2/3/4/5/6/7/8/9minecraft.net站的搬运
